topic.title: Add The Classment Of Country Connected A Website In The Sidebar
topic.body: You Can Added In The Sidebar An Representation By Country Connected By A Website As Number Of Peer And Percent, Because In The Map (Top In The Sidebar) The Border Is Not Show By Default, So Have Don't Know Where The Peer Is In What Country, Thanks Sick

1604066201_mirrored_chezsick_github.body: But Just The List Of Country With The Peer Number For Statistic
@imachug but if a person use tor, don't show the liste statistic ok? thank you!

1604066203_mirrored_kkkkketsu_github.body: But This Is An Regression, We Always Update Auto In ZeroNet, So The Clear Web Is Not Automatically Update Always Manually
